Description:
[h1][url=https://discord.gg/CVmFzn4]Join the Air Race Discord![/url][/h1]
	
	[b]• Over 1,300 members and plenty of people to race with
	• Weekly Multiplayer Tournaments with cash prize pools & multiplayer setup guides
	• Leaderboards with videos of the fastest players' laps & more
	[/b]


[h1][url=.]SUPPORT AIR RACING[/url][/h1]
The end goal of Air Racing is to have multiple maps and tournaments with prize pools that showcase the fastest and most consistent players. We are already making huge steps towards this goal, and by simply getting involved via the following links you can support our goal:

[b][url=https://twitter.com/RL_AirRace]Twitter[/url][/b]
[b][url=https://www.twitch.tv/rlairrace]Twitch[/url][/b]
[b][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzeJSsjRoAxaVaXJzRg5nJg?]Youtube[/url][/b]

[h1]Map Contributors[/h1] 
Last but not least, I need to give massive credit to the following two people in particular:
	
[b]Mr. Swaggles[/b] 
The creator of many maps & the Discord mapmaking admin, Swaggles is a blender wizard and really helped to bring the map to life with some great models and texture ideas. Has a great guide on mapmaking and without his help I would have struggled to learn anything about UDK. Cheers for everything mate :)

[b]Gidek[/b]
Another creator of many maps and a coding genius. I had no idea how I would be able to implement the features like race standings, but this guy just came along and made it look easy. The racing functionality side of things is all him. You the man :D
	
Hope to see some of you on the race track!
	
Panic.
